meanings.definition: A unit of exposure dose of X-rays or gamma rays
meanings.sent1: The doctor measured the roentgen to determine the radiation level.
meanings.sent2: The technician recorded the roentgen on the X-ray report.
meanings.sent3: I accidentally spilled roentgen all over the lab, creating a glowing mess.
meanings.sent4: Her smile was like a roentgen, shining brightly in the dark room.
meanings.sent5: The roentgen reading was so high, it glowed like a tiny star.

meanings.definition: To expose to X-rays or gamma rays
meanings.sent1: The dentist needed to roentgen the patient's teeth for a better view.
meanings.sent2: They decided to roentgen the luggage at the airport security checkpoint.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous cat managed to roentgen the entire room with the X-ray machine.
meanings.sent4: His words seemed to roentgen her thoughts, revealing everything she tried to hide.
meanings.sent5: The sunlight seemed to roentgen through the clouds, illuminating the landscape below.
